title: Identify

title: First equation
text: Since the Daniela invested $50,000 in total we can write the first equation as $$c+b=50, 000$$.

title: Second equation
text: Since the amount invested in bonds was $5000 more than twice the amount she put into the CD, we can write the second equation as $$b=2c+5000$$.

title: Solve
text: Next, using the system of equations just created, solve for c. What does it equal?

title: Answer
text: Daniela invested $15,000 in the CD and $35,000 in bonds.
speech: Daniela invested $15,000 in the CD and $35,000 in bonds.
